channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Belgian Chamber
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Belgian Chamber

item.title: Opinion Poll by Dedicated for Soirmag, 28 August–1 September 2020 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Nieuw-Vlaamse Alliantie: 19–27 seats
  • Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams: 9–15 seats
  • Open Vlaamse Liberalen en Democraten: 10–16 seats
  • Socialistische Partij Anders: 9–14 seats
  • Groen: 3–8 seats
  • Vlaams Belang: 22–30 seats
  • Partij van de Arbeid van België: 0 seats
  • Parti Socialiste: 15–22 seats
  • Mouvement Réformateur: 13–20 seats
  • Centre démocrate humaniste: 0–6 seats
  • Ecolo: 9–15 seats
  • Parti du Travail de Belgique: 7–13 seats
  • Parti Populaire: 0–2 seats
  • DéFI: 0–3 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Dedicated for Soirmag, 28 August–1 September 2020 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Dedicated for Soirmag, 28 August–1 September 2020 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Nieuw-Vlaamse Alliantie: 12.2–13.8%
  • Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams: 6.3–7.5%
  • Open Vlaamse Liberalen en Democraten: 7.3–10.0%
  • Socialistische Partij Anders: 6.5–9.1%
  • Groen: 3.3–5.3%
  • Vlaams Belang: 14.2–15.9%
  • Partij van de Arbeid van België: 0.6–1.7%
  • Parti Socialiste: 7.2–8.3%
  • Mouvement Réformateur: 6.4–7.4%
  • Centre démocrate humaniste: 1.2–1.8%
  • Ecolo: 4.5–5.4%
  • Parti du Travail de Belgique: 4.1–5.0%
  • Parti Populaire: 0.6–1.2%
  • DéFI: 0.9–1.3%
